name: Simply Rollin'
description:
Pretty good for 3 ingredients. Smells fresh from the oven. Cap's YC is perfect here, and CCI and RC just work together perfectly. Warning: Causes sugar lips! 

Where can we take this?
author: coop34

reviews.text: Simple perfection. Thank you for the recipe.
Tasty and simple. Good rep of the profile. I feel like this could be expanded to other recipes as a base as well, but just mixed like this it's a pretty good cinnamon vape.
